entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Charlottetown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:53 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlottetown Airport 10:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -4.1°C
Wind: SSW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the afternoon. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon then increasing to 40 gusting to 60. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain or snow in the evening then to snow and blowing snow after midnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas early in the evening. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 near midnight then northwest 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Windy. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Windy. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
